name: Sedan Approach
description: suburban home driveway and front yard, viewed from an elevated position on the garage, looking down at the driveway at midday. Bright natural daylight with clear sky, well-lit scene with defined shadows. A dark sedan with visible license plate. The sedan pulls into the driveway, parks, driver exits and walks toward the front door. Static elevated viewpoint, wide field of view covering driveway and street approach, slight barrel distortion at edges, Clear high-quality footage with sharp details.
